title: n8n Workflow Orchestration Platform
summary: Designed and deployed 20+ enterprise automation workflows using n8n. Integrated LLMs, APIs, and databases for no-code AI solutions. Currently employed at Sevron Ltd leveraging n8n daily.

body.raw:
## About This Project

Enterprise-grade automation platform built with n8n, demonstrating expertise in no-code AI workflow development and system integration. **Currently employed at Sevron Ltd** where I leverage n8n daily to automate complex business processes and deploy AI-powered solutions for enterprise clients.

## Overview

Developed a comprehensive workflow orchestration system using n8n to automate complex business processes, integrate multiple services, and deploy AI-powered solutions without traditional coding approaches. This experience, combined with my current role at Sevron Ltd, showcases practical expertise in enterprise-grade no-code automation platforms.

## Core Components

- **n8n Workflow Engine** - Central orchestration platform for all automations
- **LLM Integration Layer** - Custom nodes for GPT-4, Claude, and local models
- **Database Connectors** - PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and Redis integrations
- **API Gateway** - RESTful APIs for external service communication
- **Monitoring Dashboard** - Real-time workflow performance tracking

## Key Workflows Implemented

### Customer Support Automation
Achieved 95% automation rate through:
- Ticket classification using NLP
- Auto-routing to appropriate departments
- Response generation with knowledge base RAG
- Escalation triggers for complex issues

### Content Marketing Pipeline
60% efficiency improvement via:
- Keyword research automation
- Content brief generation
- Multi-platform adaptation
- Performance tracking integration

### Sales Process Optimization
Enhanced conversion rates through:
- Lead scoring with ML models
- Personalized outreach sequences
- CRM data synchronization
- Performance analytics dashboard

## Technical Implementation

### Sample Workflow Configuration

```javascript
const workflow = {
  nodes: [
    {
      name: "Data Ingestion",
      type: "webhook",
      parameters: {
        httpMethod: "POST",
        path: "/process-document"
      }
    },
    {
      name: "Document Analysis",
      type: "langchain-llm",
      parameters: {
        model: "gpt-4",
        temperature: 0.3,
        prompt: "Analyze this document: {{ $json.content }}"
      }
    },
    {
      name: "Database Update",
      type: "postgres",
      parameters: {
        operation: "insert",
        table: "document_analysis",
        columns: ["content", "insights", "created_at"]
      }
    }
  ]
}
```

## Performance Metrics

### Efficiency Gains
- **60% reduction** in manual task processing time
- **95% automation rate** for routine customer inquiries
- **40% increase** in lead conversion through personalized workflows
- **30% cost savings** on operational overhead

### System Reliability
- 99.9% uptime across all critical workflows
- Average response time under 500ms for webhook triggers
- Error handling with automatic retry mechanisms
- Comprehensive logging for debugging and optimization

## Integration Ecosystem

### Connected Services
- **CRM Systems**: Salesforce, HubSpot, Pipedrive
- **Communication**: Slack, Microsoft Teams, Discord
- **E-commerce**: Shopify, WooCommerce, Stripe
- **Analytics**: Google Analytics, Mixpanel
- **AI Services**: OpenAI, Anthropic, Hugging Face
- **Databases**: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis
- **Cloud Storage**: AWS S3, Google Drive, Dropbox

## Technical Highlights

### No-Code AI Implementation
Demonstrated ability to implement complex AI workflows without traditional programming:

- **RAG Systems** - Built knowledge bases with vector search
- **LLM Chaining** - Sequential processing with context preservation
- **Model Switching** - Dynamic model selection based on task complexity
- **Cost Optimization** - Token usage tracking and model cost management

### Scalability Design
- Horizontal scaling with worker nodes
- Queue management for high-volume processing
- Resource allocation optimization
- Performance monitoring and auto-scaling

This project showcases expertise in modern no-code/low-code platforms while maintaining enterprise-grade reliability and performance standards, directly applicable to ELGO AI's no-code GenAI platform vision.

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.code,{className:"language-javascript",children:`const workflow = {
  nodes: [
    {
      name: "Data Ingestion",
      type: "webhook",
      parameters: {
        httpMethod: "POST",
        path: "/process-document"
      }
    },
    {
      name: "Document Analysis",
      type: "langchain-llm",
      parameters: {
        model: "gpt-4",
        temperature: 0.3,
        prompt: "Analyze this document: {{ $json.content }}"
      }
    },
    {
      name: "Database Update",
      type: "postgres",
      parameters: {
        operation: "insert",
        table: "document_analysis",
        columns: ["content", "insights", "created_at"]
      }
    }
  ]
}
`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/root/Programming Projects/Personal/ai-engineer-portfolio/content/projects/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-b3c53127-61ef-459f-b4cb-72816dbdddc9.mdx",lineNumber:58,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/root/Programming Projects/Personal/ai-engineer-portfolio/content/projects/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-b3c53127-61ef-459f-b4cb-72816dbdddc9.mdx",lineNumber:58,columnNumber:1},this),`
